body_html:
Sorry for being so slow. I just added the refactor version based on @ebrevdo code. Now it supports 1d 2d and 3d convs. I have a kernel test for the 2D LSTM conv and have checked that the 1D and 3D work however I am still working on adding them to the kernel test file.

PS. @ebrevdo The code you sent me was great! I couldn't help noticing that the Conv3dLSTM is not actually implemented though. the 1D and 2D both have class Conv1DLSTM and Conv2DLSTM but there is none for 3D. Thanks again

body:
Sorry for being so slow. I just added the refactor version based on @ebrevdo code. Now it supports 1d 2d and 3d convs. I have a kernel test for the 2D LSTM conv and have checked that the 1D and 3D work however I am still working on adding them to the kernel test file. 

PS. @ebrevdo The code you sent me was great! I couldn't help noticing that the Conv3dLSTM is not actually implemented though. the 1D and 2D both have class Conv1DLSTM and Conv2DLSTM but there is none for 3D. Thanks again
